allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "Fix backend broken imports and deprecated references" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Fixed broken import in `cli/auth.py` (was importing from non-existent `client_auth` module)
- Removed reference to non-existent `app_secure` module in `web/client.py`
- Cleaned up Python cache files (`__pycache__`, `*.pyc`, `*.pyo`)
- Removed deprecated manual test files from tests directory

## Changes
- `src/ssync/cli/auth.py`: Fixed import from `..web.client_auth` to `..web.client`
- `src/ssync/web/client.py`: Updated to use unified `ssync.web.app` module instead of non-existent `ssync.web.app_secure`
- Various test files: Removed `.manual` and `.backup` files that were no longer needed

## Testing
- Verified imports resolve correctly
- Confirmed .gitignore already has proper Python cache patterns configured
EOF
)")
